about_the_game:
🥷 Void Ninja 🥷 is an action platformer that blends runner elements with a unique “Jinba Ittai” locomotion.

👉 Gameplay:

Slice, Jump, Fly, Swim-> you can't stop, just repeat. Use your hips and shoulders to steer on the path. Overcome obstacles and clear out enemies with katanas & other gadgets.

👉 Just one button — let your body do the rest!*

You don't need to remember million of combinations, or press something to move - run with the flow & help your enemies to meet your katana.


🤙 Features: 

  • 💥 Unique flow locomotion:
    Inspired by the "Jinba Ittai" philosophy, this system ensures perfect unity between player and the game - you simply act as you would in real life.

  • 💥 Just one button — let your body do the rest!
    Natural body movements & gestures for 95% of controls - you dont need to remember millions of button combinations

  • 💥 IRL skill progression:
    As you progress, you'll develop your own unique moves and combos crafted by your skill & body kinetics, not pre-made by the devs.

  • 💥 2 styles of playthrough:
    Complete the game using parkour & movement skills or by getting max kills. 40+ levels.

  • 💥 Level editor for community based challenges

    Comfort / Motion sickness tested:
    85% of players experienced no symptoms, 10% adapted after 30 minutes, and 5% did not adjust and we prefer not to talk about them.

    Current Visuals are a placeholder

    🫵 Share your thoughts, ideas and feedback with us - let's make the game together. 

    *rarely its 2 buttons, but you won't confuse them. Only 1 sounds better, right?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR only Oculus Touch/HTC Vive controllers or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR only Oculus Touch/HTC Vive controllers or better
